channel.title: [REQ] News Code
channel.description: Hi, ive been working on my server (C-scape) wich when im done i am thinking about releasing it, i just added a server GUI and was wondering if anyone had a code for a news system type think like it gets news from a txt document on a site and prints its contents into the server gui console Ex. News: hello something like that, thx

item.title: [REQ] News Code
item.dc:creator: @CJg CJg
item.description:
@CJg wrote:

something like this

This isnt a real code just an example

public void news()
{
get url (“http://cscape.t35.com/news.txt”);

misc.printlnTag ("+get url+"
}

thats not even close to any code but like something to where when i start up my server it prints the contents of “http://cscape.t35.com/news.txt” into the server gui console[br][size=1]Posted at: August 10, 2006, 03:52:42 PM[/size][hr]no one has anything?

Read full topic
